variable.item: Load Code 1
variable.label: Load Code 1

variable.item: Load Code 2
variable.label: Load Code 2

variable.item: Load Code 3
variable.label: Load Code 3

variable.item: Load Code 4
variable.label: Load Code 4

variable.item: Set sound program
variable.tooltip: See manual!
variable.label: Set sound program

variable.item: Total volume
variable.tooltip: 65 is highest distortion-free play back, INC=5
variable.label: Total volume

variable.item: Virtual cam chuff frequency
variable.tooltip: The lower the value the higher the chuff frequency and vice versa, INC=1
variable.label: Virtual cam chuff frequency

variable.item: Real cam sensor chuff rate
variable.tooltip: 0 = virtual sensor, triggers/chuff, INC=1
variable.label: Real cam sensor chuff rate

variable.item: Lead chuff accentuated
variable.tooltip: See manual, INC=10
variable.label: Lead chuff accentuated

variable.item: Overlapping effect at high speeds
variable.tooltip: Useful up to about 30, see manual, INC=1
variable.label: Overlapping effect at high speeds

variable.item: Blow-off time
variable.tooltip: How long after start-up blow-off occurs, INC=10
variable.label: Blow-off time

variable.item: Delayed start after blow-off time
variable.tooltip: 0 = no delay, 1 = blow-off on speed step 1, 2+ = 10ths of seconds, INC=1
variable.label: Delayed start after blow-off time

variable.item: Blow-off schedule
variable.tooltip: Blow-off suppressed by shunting, 10ths of seconds, INC=10
variable.label: Blow-off schedule

variable.item: Chuff volume at low speed and no load
variable.tooltip: See manual!, INC=10
variable.label: Chuff volume at low speed and no load

variable.item: Chuff volume at high speed and no load
variable.tooltip: See manual!, INC=10
variable.label: Chuff volume at high speed and no load

variable.item: Degree of volume change under load
variable.tooltip: See manual!, INC=10
variable.label: Degree of volume change under load

variable.item: Load change threshold
variable.tooltip: See manual!, INC=10
variable.label: Load change threshold

variable.item: Reaction time to load change
variable.tooltip: See manual!, INC=1
variable.label: Reaction time to load change

variable.item: Load influence for diesel engines
variable.tooltip: See manual! 0=no influence, reacts to motor speed only, 1-255, load influence increases with number
variable.label: Load influence for diesel engines

variable.item: Acceleration threshold for full load sound
variable.tooltip: See manual!, INC=1
variable.label: Acceleration threshold for full load sound

variable.item: Duration of acceleration sound
variable.tooltip: See manual!, INC=10
variable.label: Duration of acceleration sound

variable.item: Engine volume at full acceleration
variable.tooltip: See manual!, INC=10
variable.label: Engine volume at full acceleration

variable.item: Threshold for deceleration sound
variable.tooltip: See manual!, INC=1
variable.label: Threshold for deceleration sound

variable.item: Duration of reduced volume on deceleration
variable.tooltip: See manual!, INC=10
variable.label: Duration of reduced volume on deceleration

variable.item: Volume level during deceleration
variable.tooltip: See manual!, INC=10
variable.label: Volume level during deceleration

variable.item: Brake squeal threshold
variable.tooltip: Internal speed step below which brake squeal starts, INC=10
variable.label: Brake squeal threshold

variable.item: Minimum driving time before brake squeal
variable.tooltip: Unless loco is driven for this time Brake squeal will be surpressed (0-25sec), INC=10
variable.label: Minimum driving time before brake squeal

variable.item: Thyristor control: Sound pitch for stepping effect
variable.tooltip: See manual!, INC=10
variable.label: Thyristor control: Sound pitch for stepping effect

variable.item: Thyristor control: Sound pitch at medium speed
variable.tooltip: See manual!, INC=10
variable.label: Thyristor control: Sound pitch at medium speed

variable.item: Thyristor control: Sound pitch at maximum speed
variable.tooltip: See manual!, INC=10
variable.label: Thyristor control: Sound pitch at maximum speed

variable.item: Thyristor control: Speed step for medium speed
variable.tooltip: See manual!, INC=10
variable.label: Thyristor control: Speed step for medium speed

variable.item: Thyristor control: Volume at steady speed
variable.tooltip: See manual!, INC=10
variable.label: Thyristor control: Volume at steady speed

variable.item: Thyristor control: Volume during acceleration
variable.tooltip: See manual!, INC=10
variable.label: Thyristor control: Volume during acceleration

variable.item: Thyristor control: Volume during deceleration
variable.tooltip: See manual!, INC=10
variable.label: Thyristor control: Volume during deceleration

variable.item: Electric Engine Motor sound: highest volume
variable.tooltip: See manual!, INC=10
variable.label: Electric Engine Motor sound: highest volume

variable.item: Electric Engine Motor sound: where sound becomes audible
variable.tooltip: See manual!, INC=10
variable.label: Electric Engine Motor sound: where sound becomes audible

variable.item: Electric Engine Motor sound: starting point of full volume
variable.tooltip: Should be > value in CV 297. See manual!, INC=10.
variable.label: Electric Engine Motor sound: starting point of full volume

variable.item: Electric Engine Motor sound: dependence of the pitch on speed
variable.tooltip: Should be > value in CV 297. See manual!, INC=10.
variable.label: Electric Engine Motor sound: dependence of the pitch on speed

variable.item: On/off key for engine and random sound
variable.tooltip: Defines the key that turns the engine and random sounds on or off
variable.label: On/off key for engine and random sound

variable.item: On/off key for function sound
variable.tooltip: Defines the key that turns the function sounds (e.g. F2 bell) on or off.
variable.label: On/off key for function sound

variable.item: Blow-off key
variable.tooltip: Defines the key to play-back the blow-off sound manually
variable.label: Blow-off key

variable.item: Mute key
variable.tooltip: Defines key to fade in and out driving sounds
variable.label: Mute key

variable.item: Fade in/out time
variable.tooltip: Time of fade in 10ths of second. 0 is same as 10 (1sec).
variable.label: Fade in/out time

variable.item: Minimum interval for random generator Z1
variable.tooltip: Seconds. By default, the compressor is assigned to Z1. See manual!.
variable.label: Minimum interval for random generator Z1

variable.item: Maximum interval for random generator Z1
variable.tooltip: Seconds. Defines the maximum time interval between 2 consecutive pulses of the random generator Z1. See manual!.
variable.label: Maximum interval for random generator Z1

variable.item: Playback length for random generator Z1
variable.tooltip: Seconds. Play back time for associated sound. See manual!.
variable.label: Playback length for random generator Z1

variable.item: Minimum interval for random generator Z2
variable.tooltip: Seconds. By default, coal shoveling is assigned to Z2. See manual!.
variable.label: Minimum interval for random generator Z2

variable.item: Maximum interval for random generator Z2
variable.tooltip: Seconds. Defines the maximum time interval between 2 consecutive pulses of the random generator Z2. See manual!.
variable.label: Maximum interval for random generator Z2

variable.item: Playback length for random generator Z2
variable.tooltip: Seconds. Play back time for associated sound. See manual!.
variable.label: Playback length for random generator Z2

variable.item: Minimum interval for random generator Z3
variable.tooltip: Seconds. By default, the injector is assigned to Z3. See manual!.
variable.label: Minimum interval for random generator Z3

variable.item: Maximum interval for random generator Z3
variable.tooltip: Seconds. Defines the maximum time interval between 2 consecutive pulses of the random generator Z3. See manual!.
variable.label: Maximum interval for random generator Z3

variable.item: Playback length for random generator Z3
variable.tooltip: Seconds. Play back time for associated sound. See manual!.
variable.label: Playback length for random generator Z3

variable.item: Minimum interval for random generator Z4
variable.tooltip: Seconds. There is no default assignment for Z4. See manual!.
variable.label: Minimum interval for random generator Z4

variable.item: Maximum interval for random generator Z4
variable.tooltip: Seconds. Defines the maximum time interval between 2 consecutive pulses of the random generator Z4. See manual!.
variable.label: Maximum interval for random generator Z4

variable.item: Playback length for random generator Z4
variable.tooltip: Seconds. Play back time for associated sound. See manual!.
variable.label: Playback length for random generator Z4

variable.item: Minimum interval for random generator Z5
variable.tooltip: Seconds. There is no default assignment for Z5. See manual!.
variable.label: Minimum interval for random generator Z5

variable.item: Maximum interval for random generator Z5
variable.tooltip: Seconds. Defines the maximum time interval between 2 consecutive pulses of the random generator Z5. See manual!.
variable.label: Maximum interval for random generator Z5

variable.item: Playback length for random generator Z5
variable.tooltip: Seconds. Play back time for associated sound. See manual!.
variable.label: Playback length for random generator Z5

variable.item: Minimum interval for random generator Z6
variable.tooltip: Seconds. There is no default assignment for Z6. See manual!.
variable.label: Minimum interval for random generator Z6

variable.item: Maximum interval for random generator Z6
variable.tooltip: Seconds. Defines the maximum time interval between 2 consecutive pulses of the random generator Z6. See manual!.
variable.label: Maximum interval for random generator Z6

variable.item: Playback length for random generator Z6
variable.tooltip: Seconds. Play back time for associated sound. See manual!.
variable.label: Playback length for random generator Z6

variable.item: Minimum interval for random generator Z7
variable.tooltip: Seconds. There is no default assignment for Z7. See manual!.
variable.label: Minimum interval for random generator Z7

variable.item: Maximum interval for random generator Z7
variable.tooltip: Seconds. Defines the maximum time interval between 2 consecutive pulses of the random generator Z7. See manual!.
variable.label: Maximum interval for random generator Z7

variable.item: Playback length for random generator Z7
variable.tooltip: Seconds. Play back time for associated sound. See manual!.
variable.label: Playback length for random generator Z7

variable.item: Minimum interval for random generator Z8
variable.tooltip: Seconds. There is no default assignment for Z8. See manual!.
variable.label: Minimum interval for random generator Z8

variable.item: Maximum interval for random generator Z8
variable.tooltip: Seconds. Defines the maximum time interval between 2 consecutive pulses of the random generator Z8. See manual!.
variable.label: Maximum interval for random generator Z8

variable.item: Playback length for random generator Z8
variable.tooltip: Seconds. Play back time for associated sound. See manual!.
variable.label: Playback length for random generator Z8

variable.item: Switch input 1 playback time
variable.tooltip: Seconds. 0 = Play sample back once (as recorded).
variable.label: Switch input 1 playback time

variable.item: Switch input 2 playback time
variable.tooltip: (If not used for the cam sensor) Seconds. 0 = Play sample back once (as recorded).
variable.label: Switch input 2 playback time

variable.item: Switch input 3 playback time
variable.tooltip: (If not used for the cam sensor) Seconds. 0 = Play sample back once (as recorded).
variable.label: Switch input 3 playback time

variable.item: Run-on time for Diesel and Electric Auxiliaries
variable.tooltip: 0 = no run-on, 255 = 25sec
variable.label: Run-on time

variable.item: Multi-system engine Quick Select key
variable.tooltip: Function key to switch between two sound types
variable.label: Multi-system engine Quick Select key

variable.item: Delay of Switchgear sound at startup
variable.tooltip: 0 = no delay, 255 = 25sec
variable.label: Delay of Switchgear sound at startup

variable.item: Smoke Fan Speed at Steady Speed
variable.label: Smoke Fan Speed at Steady Speed

variable.item: Smoke Fan Speed at Startup and Acceleration
variable.label: Smoke Fan Speed at Startup and Acceleration

variable.item: Automatic Shut-down of Smoke Generator
variable.tooltip: 0 to 252, 25sec per unit
variable.label: Automatic Shut-down of Smoke Generator

variable.item: Steam chuff frequency at speed step 1
variable.tooltip: 0 = no effect, 1-127 = more chuffs, 255-128 = less chuffs relative to CV257
variable.label: Steam chuff frequency at speed step 1

variable.item: Fan Speed at Standstill
variable.tooltip: 0 to 255, Supplements CV133
variable.label: Fan Speed at Standstill
